name: Robot Reach
description:
Use your reachy arm to pull in shapes and push them out at enemies!

If your computer is fast enough, try the version with cool lighting here

This is our entry to Trijam #189.

Controls:

Click: Push/pull objects

Mouse: Aim

WASD/Arrow keys: Move

Kill the squares with squares, etc.

Use the TNT to blow up the yellow barricades!

Credits:

Code - Nav n Zak n Calloom

Extraordinary level design - CALLOOM

Art - Hannah C

Music - "Mega Hyper Ultrastorm" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Explosion effect - Mixkit

Other essential help - Luke
